headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.gstatic.com https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.supabase.co https://*.supabase.in https://fcmregistrations.googleapis.com https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self' data:; worker-src 'self'; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://www.google.com; manifest-src 'self'
